name: Nykaa Clone
desc: Nyka.com is an Indian online marketplace for beauty and wellness products. It offers a wide range of skincare, haircare, makeup, and personal care products from various brands.
highlights: On Landing page, product detail cards data Fetch through API.
Product Page with Filter by Product , Sort by Price

name: Delicious Pizza(Dominos Clone)
desc: Delicious Pizza is a global pizza delivery and takeaway chain with a presence in over 90 countries. Customers can order pizzas, sides, desserts, and drinks online for delivery or pickup.
highlights: Used the REST API to Fetch the data

name: Budget Tracking Application
desc: Budget Tracking Tpplication helps users stay on top of their finances by providing tools to track expenses and income, create custom budgets, and visualize their financial health in a user-friendly interface.
highlights: User Dashboard looks quite attractive and user-friendly

name: Rapid Chess
desc: Rapid Chess is a dynamic real-time chess application that delivers an exhilarating gaming experience. With its sleek interface and intuitive controls, players engage in fast-paced matches, making strategic moves against opponents worldwide.
highlights: Two person play at single time from different places.
User SOCKET.IO for Real Time Application
